name: what to do with consequences
description:
WHAT TO DO WITH CONSEQUENCES

We are Savvy, a team of 4 people who want to explore new ways of doing Open Education. We get together every week for a 8-hours jam to experiment on the new opportunities in educational resources and collective intelligence.

This time we wanted to work on CHOICES : how do we do them, what level of uncertainty we accept while making them and how we improve our strategies when facing consequences !

We made this game in 2x "8 hours Jams" + a bit of extra time working on graph assets and writing scripted events. We hope you enjoy it !

We're all from France so pleeeaaase forgive us for the bad english... and help us improve the events !

Made by Delphin Casado, Lola El Koubi, Tom Rivière and Frédéric Urien.
